header.div: Listen to Zafir's answer to the question "How do you think daily life has changed since the arrival of modern technology?" again. Could he have given a better answer?

div.p: Watch Zafir again, how many points does he make?
What advice would you give him about making his points more clearly?

ol.li: Give an example to illustrate each point
Use linking words and phrases, such as "also", or "as well as"
Use a wider vocabulary – perhaps talk about the internet, for example

div.p: Can you think of at least three ways in which daily life has changed since the arrival of modern technology? Don't forget to give an example for each one!
